channel.title: UnEthiCal || Dedicated Server || 24/7 || Full HD || 728 remake || Staff Open
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mvkgg8.png[/img][/center]
[size=8pt]Where's server headed: A full RS remake, members and nonmembers.[/size]
[b]The base:[/b] [size=8pt]677 loading 728[/size]
[b]About VPS:[/b] [size=8pt]Dedicated server, can hold over 300 players no lag[/size]
[b]Server Progress:[/b] [size=8pt]Dropbug fixed Exp decreased to normal Changed home Added NPCvsNPC Item bonus packer enabled NPC bonus packer enabled Leak fixed with GWD Over 6000 NPCs added Commands taken out RSwiki drops RSwiki shops started Webclient Old School Home page added InGameHighscores for pvp Highscores for skills Vote for points added website sided. Quest tab enabled A crap load of content skill wise added[/size]
[size=8pt]So many countless bugs fixed I can't remember them all.[/size]
[size=12pt]What is needed:[/size] Story/lore teller for forums [size=10pt]Server developer[/size] [size=8pt]All staff spots open[/size] [size=14pt]Video editor/Maker[/size] [size=8pt]Website Developer (Needs to know php, html & mysql, work over join me.)[/size] [size=10pt]Graphics/Someone who can draw[/size]
[size=14pt]Application:[/size] [size=10pt]Username: Age: Proof of work: Spot you'd like: Education: Additional information:[/size]
The UnEthiCal Terms of Service:
[size=3pt] 1. No Abusing powers. 2. No flaming anyone no matter what. 3. Staff isn't free now and then i'll ask you to do something simple. 4. No cussing. 5. Use common sense.[/size] Just type "I agree" at the end of your application.
[size=8pt]Current Staff: Owner/Developer: Taharahora Co-Owner/Monster scriptor: Blaze[/size]
Bugs left till out of closed beta:
[size=8pt]Pink - Needs to be done, Blue - Started.
Fixing leak caused a bone issue(easy fix.) Need to rewrite the rare method. Clan chat.

item.description:
@leaderofel wrote:

Username: Leaderofel
Age: 19
Proof of work: N/A
Spot you’d like: Story/Lore on Forums, I can do a little coding as well as forum/web design or Staff
Education: 1st Year of College
Additional information: EST US Timezone. 2-3 hours at the least

I AGREE

item.title: UnEthiCal || Dedicated Server || 24/7 || Full HD || 728 remake || Staff Open
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:463576”][quote author=Taharahora link=topic=567096.msg4121904#msg4121904 date=1349831373]

Expected more from you.
Looks really bad, sorry.
It wont look better with all these collours

I dont even know you?
[/quote]
One does not know I_Hybrid, only he knows you.[/quote]

Well anyways if he knew me all i do is remakes, so far i have a 317 remake, i had a 728 remake but we decided to go pvp on that so I am making another 728 server that’ll be a remake. And if he is talking about the way my thread layout is. I have never been the best as designing that stuff. I shine with java. and that’s why every thread i made in development teams have to do with getting a graphic artist or the likes

Read full topic

item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[center][/center]

[size=8pt]Where’s server headed:
A full RS remake, members and nonmembers.[/size]

The base:
[size=8pt]677 loading 728[/size]

About VPS:
[size=8pt]Dedicated server, can hold over 300 players no lag[/size]

Server Progress:
[size=8pt]Dropbug fixed
Exp decreased to normal
Changed home
Added NPCvsNPC
Item bonus packer enabled
NPC bonus packer enabled
Leak fixed with GWD
Over 6000 NPCs added
Commands taken out
RSwiki drops
RSwiki shops started
Webclient
Old School Home page added
InGameHighscores for pvp
Highscores for skills
Vote for points added website sided.
Quest tab enabled
A crap load of content skill wise added[/size]

[size=8pt]So many countless bugs fixed I can’t remember them all.[/size]

[size=12pt]What is needed:[/size]
Story/lore teller for forums
[size=10pt]Server developer[/size]
[size=8pt]All staff spots open[/size]
[size=14pt]Video editor/Maker[/size]
[size=8pt]Website Developer (Needs to know php, html & mysql, work over join me.)[/size]
[size=10pt]Graphics/Someone who can draw[/size]

[size=14pt]Application:[/size]

Age:

Education:
Additional information:[/size]

The UnEthiCal Terms of Service:

[size=3pt]

  1. No Abusing powers.
  2. No flaming anyone no matter what.
  3. Staff isn’t free now and then i’ll ask you to do something simple.
  4. No cussing.
  5. Use common sense.[/size]
    Just type “I agree” at the end of your application.

Need to rewrite the rare method.
